text: Chris Cook (born June 15, 1980) is an American cross-country skier. He competed in the men's sprint event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American male cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of the United States Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Neenah, Wisconsin
title: Chris Cook (skier)
